pr_title: Fix #3078 : record user intent for projects

timeline.bodyText: why is this no longer needed?
timeline.author: tulinkry

replies.bodyText: projects is always defined because RuntimeEnvironment does a new ArrayList.
replies.author: idodeclare

timeline.message:
Fix #3078 : record user intent for projects

Avoids the issue of a user interacting in the
browser to ultimately select zero projects but
then reviving the project list from cookies.

Also add options to SOL instead of hard-coding
OpenGrok-specific elements.
